title: EarnViaSleepwalker
contentSRCONE:
Source One : Contests

SleepWalker holds plenty of contest regulary which helps you to get ranked relative to your community mates. These contests comprise of two parts 'free' and 'paid', the free contest as goes by the name allows your to compete for free and the paid contest let you earn contest price if you finish up as one of the top 5 contestant. Contest prize is always double of the contest fee.
